name: Mazen Lawand
bio: Mazen is a senior majoring in Software Engineering with a focus in Computer Networks and Information Assurance. He has a lot of experience with computer networking, web technologies, app development, and algorithm analysis. Some of his hobbies are hanging out with friends, reading, watching movies, mountain and road biking, weight lifting, and being a nerd in general through coding or doing something with some kind of technology.
